text: Priests Ćira and Spira () is a 1957 Serbian romantic comedy movie directed by Soja Jovanović and was based on the 1894 novel Pop Ćira i pop Spira by Stevan Sremac. It stars Dara Čalenić, Ljubinnka Bobić, Nevenka Mikulić, Renata Ulmanski, Slobodan Perović. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 romantic comedy movies Category:Serbian movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Priests Ćira and Spira
